entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Go To Definition stops working #74756
  • Design-time race condition with MyProject.GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig #51768
    Backlog
  • CSharpScript.EvaluateAsync() growing memory usage #31751
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify and unify assembly loader provider #74895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Add explicit cast to UseCoalesceExpressionForIfNullStatementCheckCodeFixProvider #74471
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update field keyword feature name and details #74671
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
